This particular config typically goes for $1,650, which means you’re getting a straight-up $350 discount on it right now. We saw the RTX 5060 variant of this notebook drop to $1,050 a couple of days ago, which has since jumped back up in price, but this is the first time we’re seeing this one with an RTX 5070 drop this low. Amazon currently has this laptop listed for $1,450, so you might want to cash in on this deal at Best Buy to lock the best price before it climbs back to full price. I personally picked one of these up last year to control my wall mounted fireplace that relies on infrared to be toggled on and off. With it, I was able to set up a Siri Shortcut to turn it on and off. The hub has also allowed me to adopt more Aqara devices that require its hub for HomeKit integration.
